snippet: The Dow Jone industrial average fell more than 300 points, reversing the strong gains on Wednesday, as the market becomes more volatile.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jone industrial average fell more than 300 points, reversing the strong gains on Wednesday, as the market becomes more volatile.

headline.main: Wall St. Closes Sharply Lower, With Energy Stocks Leading the Plunge
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Closes Sharply Lower, With Energy Stocks Leading the Plunge
